content.rendered:
Directed by Amar Kaushik

Written by Niren Bhatt. Ravi Shankar Muppa. Pavel

Cast Ayushmann Khurrana (Balmukund ‘Bala’ Shukla). Bhumi Pednekar (Latika Trivedi). Yami Gautam (Pari Mishra). Saurabh Shukla (Hari Shukla / Bala’s Father). Jaaved Jaaferi (Bachchan Dubey (as Javed Jaffrey)). Sunita Rajwar (Manju / Bala’s Mother). Seema Pahwa (Indira Mausi (as Seema Bhargava)). Abhishek Banerjee (Ajju). Umesh Shukla (Nana / Bala’s Grandfather). Dheerendra Gautam (Vihan / Bala’s Brother). Deepika Chikhalia (Susheela / Pari’s Mother). Sachin Chaudhary (Young Bala). Saniya Touqeer (Young Latika). Sunheri Shah (Young Shruti). Ranjan Raj (Sumit). Mushtaq Khan (Lawyer Raina). Charu Agrawal (Older Shruti). Sumit Arora (Bala’s Boss). Tarni Alok (Prospective Bride). Varun Shashi Rao (Rohan). Swastika Chakraborty (Rohan’s Mother). Rakesh Dagg(Rohan’s Father). Soumya Wadhwani (Ad Shoot Model). Vijay Raaz (Narrator) . Sonam Bajwa ((special appearance in the song ‘Naah Goriye’)). Yash Chaturvedi (Varun). Sushil Dubey (Teacher -Anand biswas (credit only)). Avtar Gill (Self). Digvijay Singh Gurbat (Babu (as Digvijay Singh) (credit only)). Rakhi Jaiswal (Office Employee (as Rakhee Jaiswal)). Aparshakti Khurana (Shruti’s Boyfriend (cameo)).Shailesh Shankar Kulkarni. Atmaja Pandey (Kusum). Harrdy Sandhu ((special appearance in the song ‘Naah Goriye’) (as Hardy Sandhu)). Deependra Singh (Virat). Akhilesh Tripathi

Languages Hindi

Producers Naman Chouhan. Arun Singh Dikky. Hetvi Karia. Jaspreet Kaur. Sanjeev Mishra. Vivek Rangachari. Ashok Shetty. Yogiraj Shetty. Dinesh Vijan

Production Maddock Film. Skywalk Film
